error.message: Class Drupal\jsonapi\Normalizer\ImpostorFrom\fusion_connector\EntityAccessDeniedHttpExceptionNormalizerImpostor extends @internal class Drupal\fusion_connector\Normalizer\EntityAccessDeniedHttpExceptionNormalizer.
Class Drupal\jsonapi\Normalizer\ImpostorFrom\fusion_connector\ResourceObjectNormalizerImpostor extends @internal class Drupal\fusion_connector\Normalizer\ResourceObjectNormalizer.
Class Drupal\fusion_connector\Access\EntityAccessChecker extends @internal class Drupal\jsonapi\Access\EntityAccessChecker.
Class Drupal\fusion_connector\Controller\EntityResource extends @internal class Drupal\jsonapi\Controller\EntityResource.
Class Drupal\fusion_connector\Controller\FusionConnectorEntryPoint extends @internal class Drupal\jsonapi\Controller\EntryPoint.

Parameter $event of method Drupal\fusion_connector\EventSubscriber\ConfigSubscriber::onResponse() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\FilterResponseEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use ResponseEvent instead
Class Drupal\fusion_connector\EventSubscriber\ResourceObjectNormalizationCacher extends @internal class Drupal\jsonapi\EventSubscriber\ResourceObjectNormalizationCacher.
Class Drupal\fusion_connector\EventSubscriber\ResourceResponseSubscriber extends @internal class Drupal\jsonapi\EventSubscriber\ResourceResponseSubscriber.

Parameter $event of method Drupal\fusion_connector\EventSubscriber\ResourceResponseSubscriber::onResponse() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\FilterResponseEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use ResponseEvent instead
Class Drupal\fusion_connector\JsonApiResource\Relationship extends @internal class Drupal\jsonapi\JsonApiResource\Relationship.
Class Drupal\fusion_connector\JsonApiResource\ResourceObject extends @internal class Drupal\jsonapi\JsonApiResource\ResourceObject.
Class Drupal\fusion_connector\Normalizer\EntityAccessDeniedHttpExceptionNormalizer extends @internal class Drupal\jsonapi\Normalizer\EntityAccessDeniedHttpExceptionNormalizer.
Class Drupal\fusion_connector\Normalizer\ResourceObjectNormalizer extends @internal class Drupal\jsonapi\Normalizer\ResourceObjectNormalizer.
Class Drupal\fusion_connector\Routing\FusionRoutes extends @internal class Drupal\jsonapi\Routing\Routes.
Call to deprecated method assertEqual() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use $this->assertEquals() instead.

Call to deprecated method assertField() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.2.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use $this->assertSession()->fieldExists() or $this->assertSession()->buttonExists() instead.

Call to deprecated method assertField() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.2.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use $this->assertSession()->fieldExists() or $this->assertSession()->buttonExists() instead.
Call to deprecated method drupalPostForm() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use $this->submitForm() instead.

Call to deprecated method assertText() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.2.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use - $this->assertSession()->responseContains() for non-HTML responses, like XML or Json. - $this->assertSession()->pageTextContains() for HTML responses. Unlike the deprecated assertText(), the passed text should be HTML decoded, exactly as a human sees it in the browser.

Call to deprecated method assertFieldChecked() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.2.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use $this->assertSession()->checkboxChecked() instead.
